# rivestack_server_types (Data Source)

Lists available server types for Rivestack HA PostgreSQL clusters.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "rivestack_server_types" "available" {}

output "server_types" {
  value = data.rivestack_server_types.available.server_types
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `default` (String) The default server type.
- `server_types` (Attributes List) Available server types. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--server_types))

<a id="nestedatt--server_types"></a>
### Nested Schema for `server_types`

Read-Only:

- `cpus` (Number) Number of CPUs.
- `description` (String) Server type description.
- `memory_gb` (Number) Memory in GB.
- `name` (String) Display name.
- `price_per_node` (Number) Price per node per month.
- `storage_avail_gb` (Number) Available storage in GB.
- `storage_gb` (Number) Total storage in GB.
- `type` (String) Server type identifier.
